Posts.Content: elizwal wrote: What is the latest research with eating soy products? My sister and mother died in their 40s from breast cancer. My sister's cancer was estrogen receptor positive. I am lactose intolerant, it has gotten worse and I want to get back to drinking soy milk. I am a vegetarian too so soy is a great protein for me. I'm In my mid 40s. Thank you for your time. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Is soy ok to eat with a high risk of getting breast cancer? elizwal Blessings2011
